title: Bugsplat
body: Hi so about 2 days ago I restored my computer and then updated everything then from there I downloaded league again. Before I restored I didn't have this problem but now I can't even finish downloading all the patches you get when you first download the game because it gets to about 86 or 87% then I get a Bugsplat error and have to start again can anyone help me with this

replies.body:
Hey Milosky,

This might be caused by a lack of disk space on your installation drive. Can you ensure that this is not the case? If it's not, then please attach a patcher log and upload it to http://upload.wrenchmen.org/ .

Here's a quick guide on where to find the logs:

http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/howto/16?view=article
